Špela Močnik o bivših: Prijateljstvo je izključeno
V oddaji Dobro jutro je beseda tekla o nekdanjih partnerjih.
01 Nov 2019, 20:53 by P. K.



Špela Močnik. FOTO: Facebook



Debata je bila burna. FOTO: RTVSLO.si


Voditeljica jutranjega programa Špela Močnik se je v oddaji Dobro jutro jasno izrekla, kaj si misli o prijateljevanju z nekdanjimi partnerji. V rubriki, ki jo vodita z Davidom Urankarjem, je zagovarjala stališče, da to ni mogoče, s tem pa se je strinjala tudi terapevtka Veronika Podgoršek. David in Vid Valič sta sicer zagovornika tega, da sta moški in ženska lahko prijatelja tudi še po neuspešnem intimnem razmerju. 


Debata je bila burna. FOTO: RTVSLO.si

Močnikova je dejala, da svojega bivšega ne bi klicala in mu razlagala svojih skrbi in tega, kaj se ji dogaja. Rekla je, da ima zato druge prijatelje. Valič se z njo ni strinjal in je dejal, da če je partnerski odnos iskreno zaključen, potem lahko zgradiš prijateljskega.Ko je Urankar vprašal, ali je možno, da greš z nekdanjim partnerjem enkrat na mesec v kino, se je Špela še posebej ostro odzvala in dejala, da zanjo to ni normalno.

Špela Močnik about ex: Friendship is off
The Good Morning show ran on former partners.
01 Nov 2019, 20:53 by P.K.



Špela Močnik. PHOTO: Facebook



The debate was heated. PHOTO: RTVSLO.si


Morning program presenter Špela Močnik made it clear on Good Morning what she thought of her friendship with her former partners. In the section that she runs with David Urankar, she argued that this was not possible, and the therapist Veronika Podgorsek agreed. David and Vid Valic, however, advocate that a man and a woman can be friends even after a failed intimate relationship.


The debate was heated. PHOTO: RTVSLO.si

Močnikova said she would not call her ex and explain to him his concerns and what was happening to her. She said that is why she has other friends. Valic disagreed with her and said that if the partnership is honestly ended, then you can build a friendly one. When Urankar asked if it was possible for you to go to the cinema with your former partner once a month, Špela responded especially sharply and said it was not normal for her.
